Description.default: A collection of PS4 tools and experiments using the WebKit exploit.
A collection of PS4 tools and experiments using the WebKit exploit.

description.default: Unofficial external drive support for applications. Reads `app2usb.ini` from the external drive for options.
description.en: Unofficial external drive support for applications. Reads `app2usb.ini` from the external drive for options.

description.default: Backs up your PS4's databases, licenses, and user data. Note this may not be useful if you have to reinitalize as your keys may change.
description.en: Backs up your PS4's databases, licenses, and user data. Note this may not be useful if you have to reinitalize as your keys may change.

description.default: Listens for binary payloads on port 9020.
description.en: Listens for binary payloads on port 9020.

description.default: Disables firmware updates by creating dummy directories where updates are be downloaded.
description.en: Disables firmware updates by creating dummy directories where updates are be downloaded.

description.default: Dumps and decrypts applications to USB. Can be configured with `dumper.cfg` on the USB drive.
description.en: Dumps and decrypts applications to USB. Can be configured with `dumper.cfg` on the USB drive.

description.default: Permenently activates the browser without needing to sign into PSN.
description.en: Permenently activates the browser without needing to sign into PSN.

description.default: Enables updates by deleting the dummy directories created by 'Disable Updates'.
description.en: Enables updates by deleting the dummy directories created by 'Disable Updates'.

description.default: FTP server, runs on port 1337. Runs in webkit process, as such the browser must remain open. Send custom 'DECYPT' command to toggle on-the-fly SELF decryption.
description.en: FTP server, runs on port 1337. Runs in webkit process, as such the browser must remain open. Send custom 'DECYPT' command to toggle on-the-fly SELF decryption.

description.default: Homebrew ENabler. Includes UART and Spoofer.
description.en: Homebrew ENabler. Includes UART and Spoofer.

description.default: Blocks the browser from remembering and returning to the last opened page on start. Run again to enable/disable.
description.en: Blocks the browser from remembering and returning to the last opened page on start. Run again to enable/disable.

description.default: Dumps your PS4's kernel to USB.
description.en: Dumps your PS4's kernel to USB.

description.default: Renames 'fake' RIFs to 'free' RIFs for better HEN compatibility. Use this if your PKGs only work with Mira+HEN.
description.en: Renames 'fake' RIFs to 'free' RIFs for better HEN compatibility. Use this if your PKGs only work with Mira+HEN.

description.default: Restores the data saved in the 'Backup' payload.
description.en: Restores the data saved in the 'Backup' payload.

notes.default: Payloads for the Sony PlayStation 4 firmware version 4.74. Released September 17th, 2017. Kernel exploit by released by CelesteBlue (With assistance from Specter and Zecoxao) on November 18th, 2018. This was created specifically for users with broken BD drives that prevented them from updating to 5.05.
notes.en: Payloads for the Sony PlayStation 4 firmware version 4.74. Released September 17th, 2017. Kernel exploit by released by CelesteBlue (With assistance from Specter and Zecoxao) on November 18th, 2018. This was created specifically for users with broken BD drives that prevented them from updating to 5.05.
